compat-change.description: It is now required for apps to explicitly set either {@link android.content.Context#RECEIVER_EXPORTED} or {@link android.content.Context#RECEIVER_NOT_EXPORTED} when registering a receiver for an unprotected broadcast in code.
compat-change.name: DYNAMIC_RECEIVER_EXPLICIT_EXPORT_REQUIRED

compat-change.description: Apps targeting Android U and above will need to export components in order to invoke them through implicit intents. If a component is not exported and invoked, it will be removed from the list of receivers. This applies specifically to activities and broadcasts.
compat-change.name: IMPLICIT_INTENTS_ONLY_MATCH_EXPORTED_COMPONENTS
